sourcesContent:
import Button from "./component/inputs/Button"
import styled, {theme, ThemeProvider} from "styled-components"

const palette={
    mainColor : {
        background: '#222222',
        //background: '#5C7CFA',
        color: '#ffffff'
    },
    warnning : {
        background: '#FF6B6B',
        color: '#ffffff'
    },
    mono : {
        background: '#E9ECEF',
        color: '#212529'
    }
}

const ButtonWrapper = styled.div`
    width: 360px;
    margin-bottom: 16px;
`

function App () {
    return(
        <ThemeProvider theme={palette}>
            <ButtonWrapper>
                <Button size="large">버어튼</Button>
                <Button>버어튼</Button>
                <Button size="small">버어튼</Button>
            </ButtonWrapper>
            <ButtonWrapper>
                <Button color="warnning">버어튼</Button>
                <Button >버어튼</Button>
                <Button color="mono">버어튼</Button>
                <Button disabled>버어튼</Button>
            </ButtonWrapper>
            <ButtonWrapper>
                <Button color="warnning" outline>버어튼</Button>
                <Button outline>버어튼</Button>
                <Button disabled outline>버어튼</Button>
            </ButtonWrapper>
            <ButtonWrapper>
                <Button shape="square">버어튼</Button>
                <Button>버어튼</Button>
                <Button shape="pill">버어튼</Button>
            </ButtonWrapper>
            <ButtonWrapper>
                <Button fullWidth>버어튼</Button>
                <Button shape="square" fullWidth>버어튼</Button>
            </ButtonWrapper>
        </ThemeProvider>
    )
}

export default App
